name: NSStepper
desc: An interface with up and down arrow buttons for incrementing or decrementing a value.

items.name: class NSStepperCell
items.desc: An NSStepperCell object controls the appearance and behavior of an NSStepper object.

items.name: var increment: Double
items.desc: The amount by which the receiver changes with each increment or decrement.

items.name: var autorepeat: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates how the stepper responds to mouse events.

items.name: var valueWraps: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the stepper wraps around the minimum and maximum values.
